column5: When giving someone a web address, how do you change the letters to blue and underline them so the person can just click on?
just highlight and copy the url. then paste it into your post and it will automatically be clickable. use edit then copy then edit paste. whit

You have to use the http:// before the address, or it will not work.For example:If i typed www.walleyecentral.com, it just appears as text. However when i type https://www.walleyecentral.com it appears as a link (blue clickable text). The http:// is the important thing.Travis
Thanks, I'll give it a try.
